mapper.select: SELECT o.entityName name, u.nickname userName, u.Avatar userAvatar, a.nickname assigneeName, a.Avatar assigneeAvatar, o.* FROM TstAlert o LEFT JOIN TstUser u on o.userId=u.id LEFT JOIN TstUser a on o.assigneeId=a.id WHERE o.assigneeId=#{userId} AND ( (o.startTime IS NOT null AND o.startTime >= #{startTimeOfToday} AND o.startTime <= #{endTimeOfToday}) OR (o.endTime IS NOT null AND o.endTime >= #{startTimeOfToday} AND o.endTime <= #{endTimeOfToday}) ) AND o.isRead = false AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true ORDER BY o.startTime ASC
